docs.name: Indonesia: Net current transfers from abroad (current US$)
docs.description:
Current transfers comprise transfers of income between residents of the reporting country and the rest of the world that carry no provisions for repayment. Net current transfers from abroad is equal to the unrequited transfers of income from nonresidents to residents minus the unrequited transfers from residents to nonresidents. Data are in current U.S. dollars.
Net current transfers from abroad (current US$)

docs.name: Afghanistan: Percent of firms with legal status of Partnership
docs.description:
Percent of firms with legal status of Partnership   Source:World Bank, Enterprise Surveys Project(http://www.enterprisesurveys.org/CustomQuery).
Percent of firms with legal status of Partnership

docs.name: Zillow Metrics (Neighborhoods): Increasing Values (%) - Belmont Woods,Richmond,VA
docs.description: The percentage of homes whose values have increased in the past year. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

docs.name: Hepatitis B (HepB3) immunization coverage among 1-year-olds (%) - Yemen
docs.description: The GHO data repository provides access to over 50 datasets on priority health topics including mortality and burden of diseases, the Millennium Development Goals (child nutrition, child health, maternal and reproductive health, immunization, HIV/AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria, neglected diseases, water and sanitation), non communicable diseases and risk factors, epidemic-prone diseases, health systems, environmental health, violence and injuries, equity among others. More info at: http://apps.who.int/gho/indicatorregistry/App_Main/view_indicator.aspx?iid=95

docs.name: Zillow Rent Index (Zip Codes): Rentals All Homes - 97525,Gold Hill,OR
docs.description: The Zillow Home Rental Index is Zillow's estimate of the median rental price of all homes within the zip code of 97525, Gold Hill, OR. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

docs.name: Bulgaria: Secondary education, pupils
docs.description:
Enrolment in total secondary. Public and private. All programmes. Total is the total number of students enrolled at public and private secondary education institutions.
Secondary education, pupils

docs.name: Togo: Percentage distribution of public current expenditure on education by level. Upper secondary
docs.description:
Percentage distribution of public current expenditure on education by level. Upper secondary is the share of public current education expenditure that is devoted to upper secondary education.
Percentage distribution of public current expenditure on education by level. Upper secondary

docs.name: Zillow Home Value Index (Cities): One Bedroom Homes - Shingle Springs, CA
docs.description: The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of one bedroom homes within the city of Shingle Springs, CA. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

docs.name: Electricity - Consumption By Iron And Steel Industry - Finland
docs.description: The Energy Statistics Database contains comprehensive energy statistics on the production, trade, conversion and final consumption of primary and secondary; conventional and non-conventional; and new and renewable sources of energy. The Energy Statistics dataset, covering the period from 1990 onwards, is available at UNdata. For data prior to 1990, please refer to http://unstats.un.org/unsd/energy/edbase.htm.

docs.name: Uganda: percentage of population (15+), 15+, total, no education
docs.description:
Percentage of population, 15+, total, no education is the percentage of the population over age 15 with no education.
percentage of population (15+), 15+, total, no education

docs.name: Togo: population in thousand, 35-39, total, no education
docs.description:
Population in thousand, 35-39, total, no education is the total number of people age 35-39 (in thousands) with no education.
population in thousand, 35-39, total, no education

docs.name: Afghanistan: Repeaters in secondary. Grade 1. Total
docs.description:
Repeaters in secondary. Grade 1. Total is the number of pupils in the specified grade who are enrolled in the same grade for a second (or further) year. 
Repeaters in secondary. Grade 1. Total

docs.name: Madagascar: Water pollution, metal industry (% of total BOD emissions)
docs.description:
Industry shares of emissions of organic water pollutants refer to emissions from manufacturing activities as defined by two-digit divisions of the International Standard Industrial Classification (ISIC), revision 2: primary metals (ISIC division 37). Emissions of organic water pollutants are measured by biochemical oxygen demand, which refers to the amount of oxygen that bacteria in water will consume in breaking down waste. This is a standard water-treatment test for the presence of organic pollutants.
Water pollution, metal industry (% of total BOD emissions)

docs.name: Nigeria: Adjustments to scheduled debt service (current US$)
docs.description:
Adjustment to scheduled debt service equals debt service not paid plus debt service arrears reductions and prepayments. Data are denominated in U.S. dollars.  
Adjustments to scheduled debt service (current US$)

docs.name: Lesotho: Imports GNFS deflator, LCU
docs.description:
The Imports GNFS implicit deflator is the ratio of  Imports GNFS in current local currency to Imports GNFS in constant local currency. The base year varies by country.
Imports GNFS deflator, LCU

sources.description: Zillow is an online real estate database that was founded in 2005 and created by Rich Barton and Lloyd Frink, former Microsoft executives and founders of Microsoft spin-off Expedia. Spencer Rascoff is the current CEO of Zillow, Inc.
